column2: Hey - if you're lost and want to get out of here, just close this whole window. Otherwise...
Check out that *pulsing button* on the *left*!
Nice! You *flipped* the door - that lets you see what's going inside it. Let's *hack* it open!
Keep going! Maybe there's something you have to *match*...
Awesome! The door's unlocked, let's *flip* back to the front side to open it.
